page.title: 08EARLSHEATON HIGH SCHOOL
page.content: Friday-the best day at Earlsheaton High School.It's straight to the form room for registration, then to the hall for second year assembly. Lessons! Creative Studies comes first then Technical Drawing for me in the computer room;drawing pictures on the computer good enough to store and print. After break so it's Maths.Today it's revision and I settle to 27 simple equations.The bell rings.We proceed to English,a library lesson which I enjoy. Then home for lunch. The afternoon's first lesson is Music Theatre.On to French. It's verbs but at least there's no test today.Lastly comes Science a lesson about different gases.I'm glad when the bell goes- the end of lessons, the day and another school week.
